title: Atlantic County economic diversity report predicts early successes
content:
SOMERS POINT — The region can expect to quickly attract aviation repair, maintenance and overhaul operations to Atlantic City International Airport, and tenants to the Stockton Aviation Park, said Angelos Angelou in an overview of his economic development plan Thursday morning.
